name: AirHockey3
effect: Make your NetNavi strength +2 for each card you have in hand more than your opponent has in hand.

name: AquaCustom
effect:
Style Change. Whenever a player spends a Blue resource, you may make your opponent discard a card.
Water douses fire.

name: AquaCustom Activate!
effect: Style Change. Spend 4 blue resources for no effect to reveal your opponent's hand. Add the number of resources revealed to your NetNavi's strength and defense for the rest of the game.

name: AquaUpper3
effect: Burn 4 power. Each time a player spends a resource, you may make your NetNavi strength +4.

name: At Fault
effect:
SPEND: Search your opponent's deck and place a card there in his or her discard pile.
"The one who's responsible for this is Bass."

name: Backed Up
effect:
SPEND: Return this resource to your hand.
"I call upon the power of Mother Earth."

name: BambooLance
effect: Return any number of cards in your power gauge to hand. Make your WoodMan strength +1 for each card in your hand.

name: Beginning to Learn
effect:
For each card your opponent drew this turn, he or she spends a resource for no effect.
"Let that be a lesson to you."

name: BigHammer3
effect: Whenever you blast, you may add 4 to your blast destiny

name: BomBoy
effect: Virus. SPEND: Discard a card to reduce a NetNavi's defense to 0. (Viruses are not unique. Whenever you play a virus, you may play another copy of that virus from your deck, then shuffle your deck.)

name: Bow Down
effect:
Name a destiny and reveal your opponent's hand. For each revealed card with that destiny, your opponent loses 2 energy.
"Master ShadowMan."

name: Branched Out
effect:
SPEND: Discard any number of cards. For each card discarded, make your WoodMan strength +2 and your opponent lose 1 energy.
CutMan is defeated... naturally.

name: BugBomb
effect: Opponent cannot play events or BattleChips. Place this card in your power gauge.

name: BugCharge
effect: Discard a card to make your Bass defense +2 for each card in your power gauge.

name: Carb Craving
effect:
SPEND: Discard 2 cards to power up three times.
"Noo-oo-oodles."

name: CircleGun1
effect: Make your NetNavi strength +1 for each card in your hand. Place this card on top of your deck.

name: Connection Interrupted
effect:
SPEND: Burn a power and name a color. For each resource your opponent has in play of that color, he or she discards a card.
"Cutting their communications line was smart."

name: Cutting Edge
effect:
Opponent loses an energy for each card fewer than 5 in his or her hand.
"Snip it."

name: Deletion Inevitable
effect:
Discard a BattleChip to make your opponent lose 4 energy.
Even the strongest NetNavi cannot survive the wrath of Grave.

name: Doubting Navi
effect:
SPEND: Discard a card to burn an opponent's power.
"Unbeatable? Yeah, sure."

name: Drawn to It
effect:
SPEND: Discard 2 cards to place 2 cards from your discard pile in your power gauge.
"MagnetLine!"

name: Eerie Blast
effect:
Reveal the cards in your power gauge. If their total destiny is greater than 15, opponent places his or her hand in his or her power gauge.
SkullMan's blasts are just a little creepier.

name: ElecShock
effect: Burn 5 power and note the total of the destinies of all resources in play. Add that amount to your NetNavi's strength.

name: ElecTeam
effect:
Style Change. During each of your draw phases, if the only resources in play are yellow, you may power up an additional time.
Electricity zaps water.

name: Eliminate
effect:
SPEND: Return this resource or a resource in play to its owner's hand.
"Go find and delete the NetNavi called Bass."

name: Envious Evil
effect:
SPEND: Lose 1 energy.
"These days everything is Grave, Grave, Grave."

name: Evolution
effect:
If you have exactly 2 cards in hand, place both of them in your power gauge.
Incredible power comes with a high price.

name: Firm Barrier
effect:
SPEND: Discard a card to make your NetNavi defense +2.
"Activate the force field."

name: Fish at Hand
effect:
SPEND: Burn 3 power to recharge an energy for each resource in play and each card in your hand.
"Ready, Commander Beef."

name: Flawless
effect:
SPEND: Place a card from your discard pile on top of your deck.
"Bass is a fail-safe program that regenerated itself from the ashes of PharaohMan."

name: Food Education
effect:
SPEND: Lose 3 energy to draw 3 cards.
"Didn't you ever learn the difference between a chicken leg and a shish kebab?"

name: Fortified
effect:
Recharge 2 energy.
“Noodles may be popular, but curry sure is tasty and filling.”

name: Frozen Out
effect:
If you have exactly 3 cards in hand, lose an energy to take a card from your discard pile into hand.
"For you, now, the battle has ended."

name: Gender Differences
effect:
SPEND: Lose 2 energy to take a card from your discard pile into hand.
"He's a little too into this-guys and their cars!"

name: Geyser
effect: Return any number of your resources in play to hand. Make your SharkMan strength +3 for each resource returned.

name: Giving It Away
effect:
SPEND: Discard 2 cards to recharge 3 energy.
"Doing good in the world is what we're all about."

name: Grave VirusBeast
effect:
Whenever you play another Bass card, you may burn an opponent's power.
"It's a cyberbeast, and he looks hungry!"

name: Guardian of the Forest
effect:
SPEND: Burn a power and name a color. Recharge 2 energy for each resource of that color your opponent has in play.
And I am the Earth Avenger."

name: Guarding Solo
effect:
If you have no cards in hand, make your NetNavi defense +3.
"I'll defend the whole city myself."

name: GunDelSol2
effect: Make your NetNavi defense +6.

name: GutsMan: Full Out Battler
effect:
Ally. SPEND: Make your blast destiny +4.
"Hey, no holding back. GutsMan can handle anything you've got."

name: HeatGuts
effect:
Style Change. For each other red resource in play, your NetNavi's blast destinies are each +1.
Fire scorches wood.

name: HeatGuts Activate!
effect:
Style Change. Look at the cards in your power gauge. You may play each of them this main phase, even if it is a resource. Burn all of your remaining power at the end of turn.
Turn up the heat.

name: Helping Out
effect:
SPEND: Burn a power to cancel a BattleChip.
"I just wanted to lend a hand."

name: Hidden Force
effect:
SPEND: Burn a power and name a color. Destroy all but one of your opponent's resources of that color.
"Something dark and amazingly powerful must be behind all these strange disappearances."

name: Immobilize Force
effect:
SPEND: Discard a card to make your opponent take all cards in his or her power gauge into hand.
Restrain their power.

name: Interconnected
effect:
SPEND: Discard a card to blast. This does not count against your blast limit.
"Now, become one with me."

name: Just a Nuisance
effect:
SPEND: Discard a card and note its color. Cancel a blast destiny of that color.
"Your little blaster shots are no worse than mosquito bites."

name: Kid Grave: Just a Puppet
effect:
Whenever you play another ShadowMan card, you may make your opponent lose 1 energy for each resource he or she has in play.
"Things couldn't be working out more perfectly."

name: Lark
effect: Virus. SPEND: Burn a power to make your opponent discard a card. (Viruses are not unique. Whenever you play a virus, you may play another copy of that virus from your deck, then shuffle your deck.)

name: Like You Mean It
effect:
Opponent discards a card.
“I'm sorry, I'm sorry. I'll never do it again."

name: MagBolt3
effect: Opponent may spend any number of resources for no effect. Then make your MagnetMan strength +3 for resource he or she has in play.

name: MagnetMan: Polarized
effect: Whenever you blast, you may recharge 2 energy.

name: MagTect
effect: Virus. SPEND: Lose 3 energy to place a card from your discard pile in your power gauge. "(Viruses are not unique. Whenever you play a virus, you may play another copy of that virus from your deck, then shuffle your deck.)"

name: Maysa: Commander Beef
effect:
NetOp. Whenever you play another SharkMan card, you may take a card from your power gauge into hand.
"Whatever Grave's up to this time is serious."

name: MegaMan: NetCity Defender
effect: Whenever you play a BattleChip, you may burn an opponent's power. Decipher Convention Exclusive 2005

name: MegaModification
effect:
SPEND: Discard a yellow card to place 2 cards from your discard pile in your power gauge.
"My arms feel transformed."

name: Memory Scan Complete
effect:
SPEND: Lose an energy and addits destiny to each of yourblast destinies.
"I've finished with your MegaMan."

name: Meteors1
effect: You may play up to 2 additional BattleChips. At the end of turn, if in your discard pile, return each to hand.

name: Mine
effect: Make your NetNavi strength +2 for each virus your opponent has in play.

name: Mission of Defeat
effect:
SPEND: Whenever you spend another resource this turn, you may place it in your power gauge.
"How convenient that we share the same goals."

name: Miyu: Misteriyu
effect:
NetOp. Whenever you play another SkullMan card, you may place a resource from your discard pile in your power gauge.
"The truth will follow. Be very careful."

name: Modest Defense
effect:
Opponent reveals his or her hand. Place a revealed BattleChip in your opponent's discard pile.
Sometimes you have to go back to the basics.

name: Mr. Famous: Suave Savant
effect:
SPEND: The next time you spend a
resource, leave it in play instead of placing it in your
discard pile.
Lore: "I'm the famous Mr. Famous."

name: Mr. Gauss: Devious Investor
effect:
NetOp. Whenever you play another MagnetMan card, you may power up.
"I've outdone myself this time. Such a lovely catastrophe."

name: Muramasa
effect: Opponent may discard any number of cards. Then make your ShadowMan strength +2 for each card in your opponent's hand.

name: Mystical
effect:
SPEND: Opponent cannot play events and BattleChips until end of next turn.
Scary looking and even scarier sounding.

name: No Alternatives
effect:
Discard a BattleChip to replace each card in your opponent's power gauge with a card from his or her discard pile. Place the replaced cards in your opponent's discard pile.
"There's no other way."

name: No Joke
effect:
Opponent powers up twice.
"GutsMan not laughing."

name: No More Practice
effect:
SPEND: Discard a yellow card to blast an additional time.
"Now we strike a real blow."

name: One to Talk
effect:
SPEND: Place a card from your discard pile on top of your deck.
"Enjoy the dummies, dummies."

name: Opposites Attract
effect:
Whenever you lose energy during battle, take the lost cards into hand.
"Initiate North-South tackle."

name: Out of Water
effect:
Play any number of resources.
"I'm going to show everyone what the Incognito can do."

name: Pay a Price
effect:
Opponent discards a card for each resource he or she spent this turn.
"Talk is cheap, MegaMan, but I'll destroy you for free."

name: Pulls You In
effect:
SPEND: Discard a card to recharge 4 energy.
"He's got a magnetic personality."

name: Quite Confident
effect:
If you have exactly 1 card in hand, power up twice.
"Nothing's going to stop me now."

name: Reckless
effect:
SPEND: Discard 2 yellow cards to destroy 3 of your opponent's resources.
GTS 2005 Exclusive

name: Recovery10
effect: Make your opponent take 2 random card from his or her discard pile into hand to make your NetNavi defense +2.

name: Requital
effect:
SPEND: If you played a BattleChip this turn, place 2 cards from hand in your power gauge.
"I'm here to make you pay for what you did."

name: RollArrow3
effect: Burn 2 power to reveal 3 random cards from your opponent's hand. Add the total of their destinies to your NetNavi's strength.

name: Sal: Black Rose
effect:
NetOp. Whenever you play another WoodMan card, you may take a BattleChip from your discard pile into hand.
"Jack in, WoodMan, Power Up!"

name: Sanctuary
effect: Whenever you burn an opponent's power, you may recharge 4 energy.

name: Set to Win
effect:
SPEND: If you played a BattleChip this turn, add 5 to your blast destiny.
"It's time to defeat all those no good space aliens."

name: Shadow Boss
effect:
SPEND: Discard a card to make your opponent lose 1 energy for each card in his or her hand over 2.
Divide and conquer.

name: ShadowMan: Dark Ninja
effect: Whenever you blast, you may return up to 2 resources to their owners' hands.

name: SharkMan: Fishy Agent
effect:
Ally. SPEND: Cancel a BattleChip.
"As dashing as his NetOp, Commander Beef."

name: SkullMan: Friendly Ghoul
effect:
Ally. SPEND: Place a resource in play in its owner's power gauge.
NetCity's nicest spook.

name: SkullMan: Skeletal Agent
effect: Whenever you blast, you may place your resource in play in your power gauge.

name: Spidy
effect: Virus. SPEND: Make your opponent draw a card. "(Viruses are not unique. Whenever you play a virus, you may play another copy of that virus from your deck, then shuffle your deck.)"

name: Stuck in Place
effect:
SPEND: Discard a card to power up once for each resource you have in play.
"We've fallen right into his trap."

name: Surprise Transfer
effect:
SPEND: Lose 2 energy to place a card from hand in your power gauge.
"All of AyanoTech's money somehow ended up getting transferred into Higsby's account."

name: Surprisingly Sharp
effect:
SPEND: If you played a BattleChip this turn, draw 2 cards.
"FinCutter!"

name: Sweet Indignation
effect:
SPEND: Burn a power to take a card from your deck into hand. Shuffle your deck.
"That's no snack! It's the most expensive dessert in the entire universe."

name: The Oath
effect: SPEND: Burn a power to cancel a blast destiny.
"I made TorchMan a sacred vow: that I would avenge him."

name: Timber Terror
effect:
SPEND: Make your hand size +2 until end of your next turn.
"WoodTower!"

name: Unlikely Source
effect:
Discard a BattleChip to make your opponent blast, if possible. Place this card in your power gauge.
GutsMan and the Program Advance.

name: Usual Policy
effect:
SPEND: Burn a power and name a color. Opponent loses 2 energy for each resource of that color he or she has in play.
"Sorry, pal, but that's the way it works with Grave."

name: Viperous Vines
effect:
SPEND: Lose 2 energy to take a card from your discard pileinto hand.
Creep in on your opponent.

name: VoodooDoll
effect: Burn 3 power to make your Skull-Man strength +2 for each resource your opponent has in play and each card in his or her power gauge.

name: Vulcan3
effect: Make your NetNavi strength +4.

name: Watch Out
effect:
SPEND: Power up.
"That bonehead's a tricky one."

name: WhiteWeb2
effect: Opponent cannot draw cards.

name: WoodMan: Outdoorsy
effect:
Ally. SPEND: Take a card from your discard pile into hand.
WoodMan uses nature's best in battle.

name: WoodShield
effect:
Style Change. The first time each turn you draw a card, reveal it. If that card is Green, draw another card.
Wood grounds electricity.

name: WoodShield Activate!
effect:
Style Change. Place all of your resources, cards in hand, and cards in your power gauge on the bottom of your deck. Recharge 2 energy for each card placed there.
Whirlwind launcher.

name: Wrap It Up
effect:
Add 3 to your blast destiny.
"Let's finish this once and for all."

name: Your Apologies
effect:
Opponent draws 2 cards for each point of energy he or she has lost this turn.
"Sorry, KnightMan."
